title: fix typos
description: I found a bunch of typos, will fix under this issue.

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content: its->it's, it's->its, plus a few typos I found near these

comments.author: Ahmet Arslan
comments.content: Use account "steve_rowe" instead, I had this patch handy but it was overlooked. Can please you look into it?

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content:
Use account "steve_rowe" instead, I had this patch handy but it was overlooked. Can please you look into it?

Thanks Ahmet Arslan, I looked for more misspelled versions of the typos in your patch, and have attached the expanded result.  I'll commit shortly.
